name: Warhammer 40K Bundle
description:
Discover the grim dark universes of Warhammer where there is only war. From Warhammer 40,000 to Warhammer Fantasy and more - discover it all on GOG Warhammer Franchise page. Play through the games of Warhammer 40,000 created by award winning studio Relic Entertainment and get them on a lower, exclusive price in this bundle! Try different genres in the same universe.
Warhammer 40K Bundle includes:
Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Master Collection - Prepare yourself for the grim, dark future of the 41st millennium, where alien races battle mankind for galactic domination in a universe of unending war. Have control over larger armies, including various infantry, vehicles, and other unit types all in a traditional RTS gameplay.
Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Grand Master Collection - Continue the adventure in 41st Millennium in the Sub-Sector Aurelia with the sequel that takes a more squad-focused, tactical approach with a greater emphasis on individual unit abilities and RPG elements, but still within its RTS genre.
Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - You are Captain Titus, a Space Marine of the Ultramarines chapter and a seasoned veteran of countless battles. Space Marine puts a stronger focus on melee combat, a single-player campaign that follows the story of a main character.


System requirements and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
